Sequence Information.Peptide Name: Hemiptericin (antimicrobial protein; natural AMPs; insects, arthropods, invertebrates, animals, UCLL1)

Literature.Author: Cociancich S, Dupont A, Hegy G, Lanot R, Holder F, Hetru C, Hoffmann JA, Bulet P. 1994
Literature.Title: Novel inducible antibacterial peptides from a hemipteran insect, the sap-sucking bug Pyrrhocoris apterus

Sequence Information.Comments: Sequence analysis: APD analysis reveals this sequence is most similar (31.13%) toLugensin B. GRAVY: -0.957; mol formula: C638H1005N196O199S2; mol wt: 14744.291; mol ex Coeff: 21120;Activity: The fraction (peak 1) used to purify this peptide was active against E. coli. Warning: not tested on the purified form yet.
